about_the_game:
Welcome to GRIDLOCK, a thrilling puzzle game that will test your strategic thinking and quick reflexes!
Key Features:

  • Multiple Game Modes: Classic, Fast, Time Attack, Whack-a-mole, Hot Chase, and more to unlock!
  • Challenging Gameplay: Navigate a grid-based arena, avoiding obstacles and defeating enemies.
  • Strategic Decision Making: Every move counts! Plan your path carefully to outsmart your foes.
  • Progressive Difficulty: Start with simple levels and work your way up to intense challenges.
  • Unique Enemies: Face various enemy types, each with their own behaviors and abilities.
  • Vibrant Visuals: Enjoy colorful, retro-inspired graphics that bring the game to life.
In GRIDLOCK, you'll step into a world where strategy meets arcade action. Move across a grid, dodging obstacles and eliminating enemies as you race against time or limited moves. Each game mode offers a unique challenge:

  • Classic: Clear the screen of enemies before you run out of moves.
  • Time Attack: Defeat as many enemies as possible before the clock runs out.
  • Whack-a-mole: React swiftly to eliminate enemies before they disappear.
  • Hot Chase: Pursue elusive targets across a maze-like grid.

As you progress, you'll encounter tougher obstacles, smarter enemies, and more complex scenarios. Can you adapt your strategy to overcome each new challenge?
With its easy-to-learn but hard-to-master gameplay, GRIDLOCK is perfect for quick gaming sessions or hours of strategic fun. Challenge yourself, beat your high scores, and become the ultimate GRIDLOCK champion!
Are you ready to prove your tactical prowess on the grid? Jump into GRIDLOCK now and see if you have what it takes to become the master of the arena!

name: Gridlock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 92 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 92 MB available space

short_description: GRIDLOCK: A fast-paced, strategic puzzle game where every move counts. Navigate the grid, outwit enemies, and master unique game modes in this challenging arcade experience.
